name: Lifeblood (itch) (Arctic Allosaurus)
description:
Lifeblood is an unforgiving game where choices stack. 

A survivor is trying to build a way out of a world where the belief that the blood contains the soul has formed a cult. In order to build their machine the survivor must hunt, search and give their blood in order to collect the needed items.

Music by: Mattia Cupelli & ThrillShowX

Art & Design: Ekku Meronen

Programming & Design: Sokka
